DomainData.MainInfoText: Kami menggunakan tiga jenis kuki pada laman web kami: perlu, fungsian, dan pengiklanan. Anda boleh memilih keluar daripada kuki fungsian dan pengiklanan. Klik pada kategori kuki yang berlainan untuk mengetahui selanjutnya tentang setiap kategori dan untuk menukar tetapan lalai.
DomainData.AlertNoticeText: Kami menggunakan kuki supaya interaksi anda dengan laman web kami adalah lebih bermakna. Kuki itu membantu kami memahami dengan lebih baik cara laman web kami digunakan, maka kami dapat menyesuaikan kandungan untuk anda. Untuk mendapatkan maklumat lanjut tentang kuki berlainan yang kami gunakan, baca Kenyataan Privasi. Untuk menukar tetapan dan pilihan kuki anda, lihat Pengurus Persetujuan Kuki.
DomainData.PreferenceCenterMoreInfoScreenReader: This opens cookie policy in a new window
DomainData.CookieListDescription: A cookie is a small piece of data (text file) that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Those cookies are set by us and called first-party cookies. We also use third-party cookies – which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for our advertising and marketing efforts. More specifically, we use cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes:

Groups.GroupDescription: Kuki perlu diperlukan untuk fungsi asas laman web. Beberapa contoh termasuklah: kuki sesi yang diperlukan untuk menyiarkan laman web, kuki pengesahan dan kuki keselamatan.

Kuki fungsian meningkatkan fungsi, prestasi, dan perkhidmatan pada laman web. Beberapa contoh termasuklah: kuki yang digunakan untuk menganalisis trafik laman web, kuki yang digunakan untuk penyelidikan pasaran, dan kuki yang digunakan untuk memaparkan iklan yang tidak ditujukan kepada individu yang tertentu.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gat
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics, according to documentation it is used to throttle the request rate - limiting the collection of data on high traffic sites. It expires after 10 minutes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ga
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics - which is a significant update to Google's more commonly used analytics service. This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier. It is included in each page request in a site and used to calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the sites analytics reports.  By default it is set to expire after 2 years, although this is customisable by website owners.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics. This appears to be a new cookie and as of Spring 2017 no information is available from Google.  It appears to store and update a unique value for each page visited.

Groups.GroupDescription: Kuki pengiklanan menjejaki aktiviti merentasi laman web bagi memahami minat penonton, dan menghalakan pemasaran yang khusus kepada mereka. Beberapa contoh termasuklah: kuki yang digunakan untuk pemasaran semula, atau pengiklanan berasaskan minat.

These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit.    If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
